participant_1.background:
I am a city dweller who is passionate about helping people.
I spill my Coke all the time when I'm talking.
I cherish my dog's ashes.
i don t get along with my family.
i play the drums.

participant_2.background:
I'm not the most coordinated person, and I'm always tripping over my own feet.
i love money.
I'm more interested in my education and my family than I am in social media.
I drive a minivan to transport my toddler and all of her gear.
i have two siblings.

content.text: I'm so passionate about helping people. I wish I could just do it full-time.
That's great! I wish I could do my full-time job too.
What do you do?
I'm a mom to a toddler and I drive a minivan.
That sounds like a lot of work!
It is, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is! I'm not coordinated enough to have a kid, I'm always tripping over my own feet.
I'm not very coordinated either, but I manage.
I'm impressed! I love money, but not enough to have a kid.
I don't love money, but I love my family.
I wish I could get along with my family.
I love my family, but they're not always easy to get along with.
I'm sorry to hear that. I have a dog who I love very much. I cherish his ashes.
I love my dog too. I'm not sure what I would do without her.
I don't know what I would do without my dog either. I play the drums, but I spill my Coke all the time when I'm talking.
I'm not very coordinated, but I can play the drums. I don't spill my Coke when I'm talking, but I do trip over my own feet.
I guess we're not so different after all.
I guess not. We're both passionate about helping people, we're both not very coordinated, we both love our families, and we both have dogs.
I think we're going to be friends.
I think so too
